slopeEst1 <- c()

for (i in 1:1000) {
  x <- runif(10, 0, 100)
  e <- rnorm(10, 0, 5)

  y <- 200 + x*10 + e
  slope <- lm(y ~ x)$coef[2]
  slopeEst1[i] <- slope
}

mean(slopeEst1); sd(slopeEst1)
MD1 <- sum(abs(slopeEst1 - 10))/1000
